pr_title: Updates to Readme and Changelog for version 0.12.0

timeline.bodyText: Previously have been adding PR links, I think we should keep it.
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,9 +1,32 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
+## [0.12.0] (date)
+
+#### Added
+
+- Support for local copybooks
+- Dynamic registration for watchers
+
+#### Changed
+
+- Adjust the info message about missing copybooks
+- Reduce the number of error/informational messages
+- Inform user about wrong credentials and stop sending other MF requests
+- Updates to README
+
+#### Fixed
+
+- Create a .gitignore file if it doesn't exist
+- Fix glob pattern for dynamic registration
+- Fix issue with indirect overwrite settings conf for DSN paths
+- Fix issues related to unrecognised copybook extensions
+- Fix representation of settings.json in Theia
+- Use sync APIs to create a folder and write to a file to avoid unexpected behavior

replies.bodyText:
We were. I was told by @zimlu02 to stop doing this as of v0.11.0 and to use the added/fixed/changed format, not listing every PR or commit and just summarising main ones, without PR numbers.
We need to agree on a format for the changelog going forward, we can't just keep changing our minds about it. Let's talk about it at the standup today.
replies.author: zeibura

timeline.message: Remove compatibility section from client readme

timeline.bodyText: Maybe, we may drop this point? It is a part of the local copybooks support
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,31 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
+## [0.12.0](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/compare/0.11.1...0.12.0) (2020-07-07)
+
+#### Added
+
+- Support for local copybooks
+- Dynamic registration for watchers

timeline.bodyText: The fix regarding "Change log archive path pattern to relate on the user directory #307 (9c6c882)" was by user's request, I think we should add it also here. It may be something like "Fix appearing of log files inside workspace folder"
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,31 @@
 # Changelog
 All notable changes to the COBOL Language Support extension are documented in this file.
 
+## [0.12.0](https://github.com/eclipse/che-che4z-lsp-for-cobol/compare/0.11.1...0.12.0) (2020-07-07)
+
+#### Added
+
+- Support for local copybooks
+- Dynamic registration for watchers
+
+#### Changed
+
+- Adjust the info message about missing copybooks
+- Reduce the number of error/informational messages
+- Inform user about wrong credentials and stop sending other MF requests
+- Copybooks downloaded from the mainframe are now downloaded to /.c4z/.copybooks in the workspace
+- Settings parameter for DSN paths changed
+- Updates to README
+
+#### Fixed

timeline.bodyText: This is applicable only for test and doesn't affect the user experience, so we may drop it
timeline.author: temanbrcom
timeline.diffHunk:
